screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .c67 file in OpenMPT
screenshot.caption: C67 file open in OpenMPT

description: Composer 670 was a music tracker developed and most famously used by the demo group Renaissance, to create music for the video games Zone 66 and Amnesia. It was based on and combined features of the Composer 667 and Composer 669 music trackers.

Audio modules created using Composer 670 are saved as C67 files. Each C67 file can consist of up to 13 audio channels (4 sample channels and 9 FM channels). It also stores the instrument audio samples used to play the song it contains.
